content.rendered:
Paras Patel joined Regent in early 2008 and has been a key part of the support for the co-founders and rest of the Regent team. She qualified as an Engineer, then completed her MBA in Finance, and she is now a qualified Chartered Certified Accountant.

She is currently leading the finance team and managing the rapid growth of Regent College London. She is a very good financial analyst with a business acumen. She is also responsible for all other Regent Group activities from a financial standpoint.
